title: Fides Privacy Center
description: This is a live version of the Fides Privacy Center, running locally on this machine! Use the options below to submit privacy requests.

actions.title: Download your data
actions.description: Runs the default access policy, which downloads all 'contact' data and uploads to ./fides_uploads

actions.title: Erase your data
actions.description: Runs the default erasure policy, which pseudonymizes all 'contact' data via HMAC masking strategy
